name: Ionut Cardei
content: Ionut Cardei Ionut Cardei Home Curriculum Vitae Publications Research Teaching About me Dr. Ionut Cardei is a Professor at Florida Atlantic University, in the department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science. He received his doctorate in 2003 and the M.Sc. degree in 1999 in Computer Science from the University of Minnesota, and the B.S. degree in Computer Science from Politehnica University of Bucharest. His main research interests are in CPS, wireless, networking and system design automation.
